articles.author: Elizabeth Rayne
articles.title: An Archaeologist Found a 1 Million-Year-Old Face - AOL
articles.description: The oldest in Western Europe, this fractured skull has introduced a series of new questions about early humanity.
articles.content: <ul><li>Fragments of human facial bones that surfaced in northern Spain have been found to be 1.1 to 1.4 million years old, meaning that they are parts of the oldest human face in Western Europe.</li… [+4240 chars]

articles.author: Victor Goury-Laffont
articles.title: Canada’s Carney starts first trip abroad with implicit digs at Trump - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The new prime minister dubbed Canada “the most European of non-European countries” while speaking alongside French President Emmanuel Macron.
articles.content: Carney, who was sworn in as prime minister on Friday, is traveling to France and the United Kingdom on Monday to shore up transatlantic support for Ottawa as it faces tariffs and annexation threats f… [+1557 chars]
